content.description: Information about host initiator paths in the storage system. Each initiator can be associated with multiple initiator paths.

attributes.description: Internal identifier of the hostInitiatorPath instance.
attributes.name: instanceId

attributes.description: Unique identifier of the hostInitiatorPath instance.
attributes.name: id

attributes.description: Operational statuses for the host initiator path.
attributes.name: operationalStatus

attributes.description: Health information for the host initiator path, as defined by the health resource type.
attributes.name: health

attributes.description: Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the associated host.
attributes.name: hostUUID

attributes.description: Indicates how the initiator in the path was registered to the host.
attributes.name: registrationType

attributes.description:
Indicates whether the host initiator is logged into the storage system. Values are:
  • true - Host initiator is logged into the storage system.
  • false - Host initiator is not logged into the storage system.
attributes.name: isLoggedIn

attributes.description: (Applies when the value of the registrationType attribute is set to ESXAuto.) Name of the host that is automatically associated with the initiator path through host push.
attributes.name: hostPushName

attributes.description: (Applies to iSCSI paths only.) Session identifiers in the host initiator path.
attributes.name: sessionIds

attributes.description: Host initiator associated with the host initiator path, as defined by the hostInitiator resource type.
attributes.name: initiator

attributes.description: (Applies to Fibre Channel paths only.) Target Fibre Channel port, as defined by the fcPort resource type.
attributes.name: fcPort

attributes.description: (Applies to iSCSI paths only.) Target iSCSI port, as defined by the ethernetPort resource type.
attributes.name: iscsiTarget

attributes.description: (Applies to iSCSI paths only.) iSCSI portal, as defined by the iscsiPortal resource type.
attributes.name: iscsiPortal

content.name: hostInitiatorPath
